# Análise dos microdados da Pnad Contínua para Artigo 3

```{r}
# Pacotes

library("tidyverse")
library("tidylog")
library("sf")
library("dplyr")
library("readxl")
library("zoo") # para trimestralizar as datas
```

Vou tentar utilizar o pacote PNADcIBGE para abrir os dados da PnadC. 

```{r}

library(PNADcIBGE)
library(survey)

# Tentando abrir diretamente dos arquivos online

dadosPNADc0419 = get_pnadc(year = 2019, quarter = 4, vars=c("V2007","V2009", "V4012", "V4022", "V4024"))


pnadc_012019 <- read_pnadc("PNADC_012019.txt", "Input_PNADC_trimestral.txt")
pnadc_022019 <- read_pnadc("PNADC_022019.txt", "Input_PNADC_trimestral.txt")
pnadc_032019 <- read_pnadc("PNADC_032019.txt", "Input_PNADC_trimestral.txt")
pnadc_042019 <- read_pnadc("PNADC_042019.txt", "Input_PNADC_trimestral.txt")
pnadc_012020 <- read_pnadc("PNADC_012020.txt", "Input_PNADC_trimestral.txt")
pnadc_022020 <- read_pnadc("PNADC_022020.txt", "Input_PNADC_trimestral.txt")
pnadc_032020 <- read_pnadc("PNADC_032020.txt", "Input_PNADC_trimestral.txt")
pnadc_042020 <- read_pnadc("PNADC_042020.txt", "Input_PNADC_trimestral.txt")

pnadc_012019_domst <-
  pnadc_012019 %>% 
    filter(V4012 == 1) %>%
    select("Ano", "Trimestre", "UF", "V2007", "V2009", "V2010", "V4012", "V4022", "V4024")


```
